function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 among construction workers due to lack of effective protocols","Impact":"Increased risk of outbreaks, illness, and job loss among construction workers","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict and effective COVID-19 protocols, regular testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, IoT-enabled safety devices, and remote monitoring","People":"Construction workers, site managers, and contractors","Owner":"Construction companies, government health authorities, and site managers"},{"Description":"Decrease in construction sector investment due to pandemic","Impact":"Economic downturn, reduced job opportunities, and financial strain on construction companies","Mitigation":"Government stimulus packages, reduced taxes for construction companies, and incentivizing infrastructure projects","Technologies":"Economic modeling and forecasting tools, financial aid platforms, and digital project management systems","People":"Construction companies, investors, and government authorities","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and construction industry associations"},{"Description":"Job loss among construction workers during the pandemic","Impact":"Loss of livelihood, financial instability, and psychological stress on affected workers","Mitigation":"Job retraining programs, unemployment benefits, and diversification of income sources","Technologies":"Online training platforms, digital job matching services, and remote work tools","People":"Construction workers, labor unions, and government agencies","Owner":"Government, labor unions, and skill development organizations"}]}
